MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: using Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MobileServices.SQLiteStore; // offline sync using Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MobileServices.Sync; // offline sync

//private IMobileServiceTable<TodoItem> todoTable = App.MobileService.GetTable<TodoItem>(); private IMobileServiceSyncTable<TodoItem> todoTable = App.MobileService.GetSyncTable<TodoItem>(); // offline sync
await PullAsync("todoItems" + userid, syncTable.Where(u => u.UserId = userid));
